moves.4... Ba6: Trying to stop my bishop coming out without dying
moves.5... Nxd5: Dang. He killed 2 pawns already. Time to play properly
moves.6. g3: If my bishop cant have ur diagonal i'll go for the other.
moves.7. Bg2: Threatening to gain a pawn through Bxd5,cxd5, Qxd5 threatening the rook
moves.8. Qb3: I continue attack on knight and now add pressure to bishop and looks across to the kings weak pawn
moves.9... Nd7: Simple block but now it's pinned
moves.10. Be3: An accidental move by me and what black should do is to take the bishop and try to close the game with a two pawn advantage
moves.11... g6: not too sure why he did this
moves.12... f5: ahh thats why. To stop the annoying pin
moves.13. e4: Lets add more pressure to the pin
moves.14... Qe6: Not too sure about this move by him. Surely Nb4 would have been better
moves.15. exd5: oh well i'll take the knight
moves.15... cxd5: Guess what!! i'm now drawing on points!!! already a comeback
moves.16. Ne2: Developing the knight and making sure the rook is able to move if d4 is played
moves.16... O-O-O: Castling queen side to get his king into safety... Or so he thinks. Now his king is in a file that my queen and rook can attack down. Also this creates a painful pin on the king and queen.
moves.18. Rac1: No thanks i'd rather attack ur king
moves.18... Rd7: oooo this is painful now his king rook and queen are on the same file as my bishop. All hiding behing a pawn
moves.20. b4: Trying to push pawns against the kingside
moves.21. f3: Take the pawn instead as a sacrifice.
moves.22... Qxh6: takes a bishop accepting two bishops for a rook and a pawn is fine
moves.23. Qxc7#: Too bad i wasn't going to take the rook. This game shows that if you play someone hard start with random moves and sack pieces. This confuses your opponent as they don't know how to combat it. I know the opponent made several bad moves but the opening throws off the opponent and they don't play properly because they think your bad. This puts their guard down for you to strike when the times right.  Hope you enjoyed it. Rate if you want to see more of these game plays!!!!
